code: export var isValidDate=function isValidDate(date){var d=Date.parse(date.toString());return isNaN(d)?false:true;};export var getTimeDifference=function getTimeDifference(eventTimestamp){var date=new Date(eventTimestamp).getTime();var diff=new Date().getTime()-date;var days=Math.floor(diff/(1000*60*60*24));var hours=Math.floor(diff%(1000*60*60*24)/(1000*60*60));var minutes=Math.floor(diff%(1000*60*60)/(1000*60));if(days>0)return"".concat(days," day").concat(days>1?'s':''," ago");if(hours>0)return"".concat(hours," hour").concat(hours>1?'s':''," ago");if(minutes>1)return"".concat(minutes," minutes ago");return'Just now';};
